description.value: Your familiar has twice as many of a small feature than a normal creature would have, such a second tail or an extra pair of whiskers. When you Cast or Sustain a hex, your familiar seems to double and be in two places at once. One creature you choose within 20 feet of it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} until the start of your next turn; this is a visual effect.
